description: Composite n, not a power of 2, such that the n-th Euler number == 1 (mod n).
prog: (PARI) a000364(n)=subst(bernpol(2*n+1), 'x, 1/4)*4^(2*n+1)*(-1)^(n+1)/(2*n+1);lista(nn) = {forcomposite(n=1, nn, if ( n != 2^valuation(n, 2), if (Mod(a000364(n), n) == 1, print1(n, ", "));););} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Apr 18 2015
author: _Benoit Cloitre_, Apr 06 2003
